meanings.definition: A very large number, equal to 1,000,000,000,000
meanings.sent1: The country's debt reached a trillion dollars.
meanings.sent2: The company's revenue exceeded a trillion for the first time.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had a trillion cookies to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was worth more than a trillion stars.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the explosion was like a trillion thunderclaps.

meanings.sent1: The treasure chest was said to hold a trillion gold coins.
meanings.sent2: The galaxy contained a trillion stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: I would need a trillion years to count all the grains of sand on this beach!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a trillion fireflies.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed through the halls like a trillion bells ringing.
